extends java.lang.Object
    The menu for edit actions.

      • enableUndoRedoItms

        public void enableUndoRedoItms(boolean isUndo,
                               boolean isRedo)
        Enables or disables the buttons for undoing and redoing actions
        Parameters:
        isUndo - true to enable, false to disable the undo button
        isRedo - true to enable, false to disable the redo button

      • enableCutCopyItms

        public void enableCutCopyItms(boolean b)
        Enables or disables the buttons for cutting and copying actions
        Parameters:
        b - true to enable, false to disable the buttons

      • selectLanguageItm

        public void selectLanguageItm(Languages lang,
                              boolean enable)
        Selects and disables the item for the specified language and enables the items for the other languages if enable is true
        Parameters:
        lang - the language that has one of the constant values in Languages
        enable - true to enable the non-selected items
